# 7.24
n = 4
mean = 1.43
sd = 0.13
t(3, .05) = 2.353
1.43-2.353*.13/2=1.277055
1.43+2.353*.13/2=1.582945

# 7.25
mean = 240
sd = 15
n = 4
t(3, 0.005) = 5.841
240-5.841*15/2=196.1925
240+5.841*15/2=283.8075

# 7.27
mean = 18
sd = 20
n = 500
z(.05) = 1.64
18-1.64*20/sqrt(500)=16.533139
18+1.64*20/sqrt(500)=19.466861

# 7.29
n = 12
(150+367+38+12+11+134+12+251+63+8+13+107)/12=97.166667
((150-58.3)^2+(367-58.3)^2+(38-58.3)^2+(12-58.3)^2+(11-58.3)^2+(134-58.3)^2+(12-58.3)^2+(251-58.3)^2+(63-58.3)^2+(8-58.3)^2+(13-58.3)^2)/12=13175.7825
sqrt(13175.7825)=114.785811
mean = 97.166667
sd = 114.785811
t(11, .005) = 3.106
97.166667-3.106*114.785811/sqrt(12)=-5.753157
97.166667+3.106*114.785811/sqrt(12)=200.086491

n = 9

sd = 0.004854
t(8, 0.025) = 2.306
0.009027-0.004854*2.306/3=0.005296
0.009027+0.004854*2.306/3=0.012758
